name: Commander Ruby's Journeys
description:
Commander Ruby's Journeys

Coursera Course: Game Design and Development 4: 3D Platformer

Total 3 Levels.

Modification: Designed and added a second and third level. Changed the player's character, and animation into a Space Commander. Within SketchUp, I 3D designed  a new red title and converted it, placing it in the Main Menu (changing the main menu page) and every level.

Playable on Mac, Windows, Web Credit: Daniel R.
